alert.note: Alert for Webb (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 24 at 8:41AM CDT until April 25 at 10:28PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Texas... Rio Grande At Laredo affecting Webb County. For the Rio Grande...including Columbia Bridge, Laredo...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Rio Grande At Laredo. * WHEN...Until late tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 8.0 feet, or 2.4 meters, minor lowland flooding occurs. Flow reaches the lower sections of the customs parking lot in Laredo. && Below are the latest river stages and stage forecasts: Fld Observed Forecasts (7 am) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu Fri Sat Rio Grande Laredo 8.0 7.9 Mon 7 am 7.9 5.3 4.8 4.8 4.8 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/crp.
